details.title: shrinklyy-t3
details.description: A URL shortening application built using the T3 stack, which provides users with a simple and efficient way to shorten long URLs for easier sharing and tracking. It also includes authentication using NextAuth.

details.title: theSchoolReview
details.description: An anonymous platform for teachers to view and share honest school reviews and salary information, helping other teachers make informed career decisions about schools across India and also they can read blogs

details.title: TL;DR AI
details.description: A Chrome extension that uses the Gemini AI API to generate concise summaries of web pages. Built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS and webpack as a bundler.

details.title: chat-with-image
details.description: A website where users can chat with images. It uses google gemini api key.

details.title: Image-Generator
details.description: A website where user can give prompt and generate image and download, share it.

details.title: E-Commerce
details.description: An E-Commerce website built with NextJS, TypeScript and TailwindCSS

details.title: Confused-Digital
details.description: it works as more than a digital agency With a passion for innovation and a commitment to excellence, Confused-Digital harness the latest technologies to transform your digital vision into reality.

details.title: Payment Application
details.description: payment application that has functionality of User Authentication Authorization using JWT, view Account Balance, Search and view other users and Send money to other users accounts

details.title: Blog Application
details.description: A medium like blog application made using hono

details.title: Flipping Card Game
details.description: This is a simple project of Flipping Cards game made by using concepts of HTML,CSS, JavaScript.
